__e: God bless to all of you.
That God, our Father and Jesus, our Brother blesses you today and always.
May the Mother of God bless you!
I told you I didn't wish to discuss that again.
For her, who told me what I told you?
16 Verily, verily, I say unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him.
Truly, truly, I say to you, it is time... to catch not fish but the souls of men...
Truly, truly, I say to you, the servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him.
I tell you now there is only one Teacher and one Father.
And I truly say, as the Lord said, that what you do to the smallest of my brothers you do to me.
I tell you this, anyone who has left home, or father, mother, wife, children, land for the kingdom of God
I am here to help you.
How else may I aid you?
I'll carry you for a while.
WHAT WARRANTIES DO I HAVE THAT THE CAR IS ACCORDING TO HAS BEEN DELIVERED?
How came you, Cassio, by that handkerchief that was my wife's?

"And when it was said that the promiseof Allah was true, and that the Hour- there was no doubt about its (coming),ye used to say, 'We know not what is the hour: we only think it is an idea,and we have no firm assurance.'"
How far, how far, is that which you are promised.
And give us all a happy ending Through Your only-beggoten Son Jesus Christ Through Whom glory and power is given to you
